      Determine if a request is authorized.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • hashCredentials

      static com.google.common.hash.HashCode hashCredentials(String credentials)
      Securely hash the credentials. Note that Guava HashCode is implemented with constant-time equals.
      Parameters:
      credentials - The credentials.
      Returns:
      The hash code.
